text: @DrSanjayGupta: Great insights from Dr. Sanjay Gupta on the future of AI in medicine! It's crucial that we prioritize brain health and measurement, especially as diabetic drug use for weight loss becomes more common. Let's not forget the importance of a healthy lifestyle to back up medical interventions. And I couldn't agree more on the need for a "trust, but verify" model with AI in healthcare - technology is only as good as the information it's trained on!
